response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which is valued at $15,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that truly exceeds expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 14000}
